alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 28 at 12:33PM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Humboldt River At Comus affecting Elko County. Humboldt River At Battle Mountain affecting Lander County. Bruneau River At Rowland affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures through this weekend will melt snowpack and increase river flows. For the Lower Humboldt...including Palisade, Battle Mountain, Comus...Minor flooding is occurring and is expected to continue. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Bruneau River At Rowland. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor flooding of Forest Service roads. Recreational use becomes limited. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:40 AM PDT Friday the stage was 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:40 AM PDT Friday was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 145 PM PDT.
